Name: Blue Lassi
Ingredients: 45 ml Ketel One Vodka infused with vanilla
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist (discarded) & mint leaf.
Review: Baby blue creamy yoghurt with vanilla infused vodka, orange liqueur and aromatic rose water.
History: Created in 2011 by yours truly (Simon Difford) at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Blue Lassi contains 232 calories
